name: Endless Nesla
description:
Endless Nesla is a demanding infinite runner game with dynamic and precise movement mechanics.


Vi must escape from the Nesla. Cross the different sectors of the spaceship, collect data, and avoid obstacles of all kinds. Will you make it?

Characteristics


-Recover hidden data
-Unlock Endless mode by escaping the spaceship
-Confront your best score with the community
-Many achievements to unlock







You will fail.. several times, but it will only make you stronger !
